data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 208,900 citizens of the the state of Azua.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Azua, Dominican Republic
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 208,900 souls living in the state of Azua with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Azua, Dominican Republic so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 22,643 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Japanese people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Azua, Dominican Republic to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 208,900 people living in Azua.

data.section_summary:
the state of Azua, Dominican Republic has a population of 208,900.

We estimate Azua has 22,643 people who might know Jesus, 173,290 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 12,967 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Azua to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.
